com.notification.manager

Class QueueManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.NotificationManager
      • com.notification.manager.SimpleManager
        • com.notification.manager.QueueManager

  • public class QueueManager
extends SimpleManager
    A NotificationManager which slides old Notifications above or below new Notifications.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  QueueManager.ScrollDirection
      Which way the new Notifications scroll.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueueManager.ScrollDirection getScrollDirection() 
      int getVerticalPadding() 
      void setScrollDirection(QueueManager.ScrollDirection dir)
      Sets the direction in which old Notifications will scroll after new ones have been added.
      void setVerticalPadding(int verticalPadding)
      Sets the vertical padding between Notifications in the queue.
      void stop()
      Stops controlling the Notifications and leaves them in their current positions.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops controlling the Notifications and leaves them in their current positions. They will still hide after the specified time, however.
